title: Can we get a true SoloQ?
body: I don't want to get a Darius/Annie duo bot lane in my ranked game just because "lolz it worked in normal". Give me a soloQ.

replies.body: You use the word cancer...but I'm not sure you know what it means.

> [{quoted}](name=Nucleophilic atk,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=sTaEFEu0,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-03-16T22:11:07.580+0000)
>
> You use the word cancer...but I'm not sure you know what it means.

a practice or phenomenon perceived to be evil or destructive and hard to contain or eradicate.

duo queueing
Yes, I know that you are wrong. That is why I said it. Glad we are on the same page, though.

> [{quoted}](name=Nucleophilic atk,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=sTaEFEu0,comment-id=000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-16T22:19:14.199+0000)
>
> Yes, I know that you are wrong. That is why I said it. Glad we are on the same page, though.

Reading comprehension fail

> [{quoted}](name=OhOkYea,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=sTaEFEu0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-16T22:02:43.782+0000)
>
> duo queuers are cancer

75% of duos are cancer. I have been carried by duo bot laners and I mysel carry with my cousin.
Yup. Lol, I must say that I would rather have 25% less good ones if it meant 75% less trolling ones, though.
